#summary Geppelin - Groovy Zeppelin

= Introduction =

I know the name's odd, but I was simply thinking about ways that messages are broadcast in real life.  Think of all those sports matches where blimps fly overhead clearly advertising for Goodyear or Metlife or displaying a message.  The name actually stands for "Groovy Zeppelin".  So, there you go.
